description: study for Plate 5 of Der Mantel (The Coat); a man stands in a black coat with his arms to his sides; behind him another man has his hands placed on the first man's shoulders; a window in the upper right has rays of sun coming through
inscription: LLC of sheet, in pencil: Zu E.59
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 18 | LL in pencil, below image: Zu Gogol : der Mantel
title: Study for Akaki Get Measured for a New Coat
